titles.title: He's All Over Me, And He's Keeping Me Alive

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He's all over me, and He's keeping me alive,
Keeping me alive, keeping me alive.
Well, He's all over me, and He's keeping me alive.
Jesus is keeping me alive.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've got the Holy Ghost, and He's keeping me alive, etc.
The Holy Ghost has got me and He's keeping me alive, etc.
I've just heard from Father and He's keeping me alive, etc.
I'm in the fire with Jesus and He's keeping me alive, etc.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
El esta sobre mi, me guarda con poder.
Me guarda con poder, me guarda con poder.
El esta sobre mi y me guarda con poder.
Cristo me guarda con poder.
